ModMetaData.name: Mashed's Lynians - The Gold Tribe
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in a new permanently hostile Gajalaka faction, the Gold Tribe, as well as an assortment of extra equipment.

A small Gajalaka tribe that worships The Mother Goddess of Gold. Known to utilise superior equipment, much of which is coated in copious amounts of gold. Most feared is their highly modified hand cannons.

The Gold Tribe will be able to raid after 40 days, and may prove a useful source of gold.

- Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
- Contains a patch for Medieval Overhaul.

- Based on the Monster Hunter series by Capcom.
